subject: Tennis
China Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych upset top-seeded Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, 6-4, 4-6, 6-1, and will meet Marin Cilic in the China Open final Sunday in Beijing.
snippet: Tomas Berdych upset top-seeded Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, 6-4, 4-6, 6-1, and will meet Marin Cilic in the China Open final Sunday in Beijing.
